insert into style (styleID, styleName, colour, `standard`, `size`, material, numstr, price, picture, flag, `operator`, createtime, filed1, filed2, filed3, filed4, filed5) values (#{styleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stylename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{colour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update style set styleID = #{styleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, styleName = #{stylename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, colour = #{colour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `standard` = #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `size` = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material = #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, numstr = #{numstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed3 = #{filed3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed4 = #{filed4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed5 = #{filed5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
